name: Gold Eater (Ludum Dare 42)
description:
Hi, it’s our 13th ludum Dare entry, and this time with game - - - - “Gold Eater” - - - I GIVE MY LIFE NOT FOR HONOR BUT FOR GOOOOOOOOLD I'M STILL IN A FOG GOOOOLD EEEEEEEATEEEEEEER - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Theme of 42th ludum was “Running out of space”. Controls: Arrows - move R - restart level F2 - restart game All code, art, animation and music were made during the Ludum Dare #42 Four Quarters team. https://twitter.com/_FQteam - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - The goal:  You need to collect the required amount of gold and fly off the island until it collapsed entirely - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Changelog: 16.05.2018
- small bugfixes
- little increased movement speed
- small changes for lvl3
